title: Looking for 1908 PC760 Rose Company Postcards...
author: Baseball Rarities

posts.post_title: Looking for 1908 PC760 Rose Company Postcards...
posts.post_content: I am looking for Rose Company postcards - raw or graded. Willing to accept any condition for the ones that I need. Also looking for upgrades for ones hat I have. I will purchase outright or have lots to trade, including many Rose Co. duplicates. Let me know what you have. I appreciate the help.
Bump. It has been nearly a year. Can anyone help me out?
I have a Rhodes SGC 80, if that helps.
Greg - I have that card, but yours would certainly be an upgrade. Shoot me a price via PM when you get a chance.
Greg - Thanks for the upgrade. Can anyone else help me out?
